data.name: DataInaccessible
data.value: Balatro data path is not accessible, make sure to check the path before launching.

data.name: SteamInaccessible
data.value: Balatro steam path is not accessible. Please check the path and try again.

data.name: NoModsDirectory
data.value: Mods directory does not exist. Make sure you have lovely installed and have opened the game at least once since then and try again.

data.name: AlreadyRunning
data.value: Balatro is already running. Please close the application and try again.

data.name: BalatroNotFound
data.value: Balatro executable not found. Please check the path and try again.

data.name: MultiInstanceUnstable
data.value: Multi-instance is unstable and might lead to data overwriting. Please proceed with caution.
